conbody.p: expressionsusing field namesfield namesin expressionsWhen a pipeline is valid for preview, expression completion provides available field names in a list. When a list is not available, use the appropriate format for the field name.
When you use a field name in an expression, use the following syntax:${record:value("/<field name>")}

p.note: You can use single or double quotation marks to surround a field name.
